brief: This is a simple Pulse oscillator.

methods.name: amp()
methods.desc: Change the amplitude/volume of this sound.

methods.name: freq()
methods.desc: Sets the frequency of the oscillator.

methods.name: pan()
methods.desc: Move the sound in a stereo panorama.

methods.name: stop()
methods.desc: Stop the oscillator from playing back

methods.name: width()
methods.desc: Changes the pulse width of the pulse oscillator.

description: This is a simple Pulse oscillator.
name: Pulse
